response.job_title: ✓ Developer of Polymeric Materials | Biomimicry & Bioengineering | Engineering advice | Dissemination & Communication |
response.summary:
I like solving problems, creating stuff, and making things work better. Curiosity is the fuel that moves me. It motivates me to innovate, to improve processes, to come up with new proposals, to seek new solutions, and without a doubt, to live with passion. Finding connections on seemingly unrelated issues and apply them in my day-to-day life as an engineer and as a citizen makes me happy.

I studied chemical engineering and a master's degree in mechanical engineering. I specialized in the development and study of polymeric materials and bioprocesses. I have designed for the industry bioactive materials based on recycled thermoplastic polymers, flexible polyurethane foams with improved mechanical properties, formulations for the production of beers with local raw materials, biodigesters for agricultural applications, and I have even experimented in the development of biomaterials to starting from fungal hyphae.

My abilities:
⌝ Design of experiments.
⌝ Optimization of processes.
⌝ Biomimicry.
⌝ Technological surveillance.
⌝ Programming in Python, Matlab, and VGA.
⌝ Modeling and simulation of processes.
⌝ Advanced Excel.
⌝ Image analysis.
⌝ Reengineering.
⌝ Root cause analysis.
⌝ 3D printing.
⌝ Handling of instruments in chemical and biological laboratories.

I am a fan of collaborative and citizen science production. I love initiatives like beekeeping or urban agriculture, as well as exploring the stars and local nature. Platforms such as INaturalist, eBird, MO Free, and YouTube have been a great help in this process of discovery with the community. ​Even though, my interests go beyond science and technology. I enjoy drawing, painting, sculpting, taking photographs, writing, and, in short, I like working with diverse communities, as after all, art, science, and technology are made by people and for people.

If you found what you read here interesting and do you want to contact me, do not hesitate to send me an e-mail at xavargasa@gmail.com .
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/xavargasa/
response.skills: Aseguramiento de la calidad, Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, Análisis de datos, Agricultura sostenible, Gestión de proyectos, Gestión energética, Biotecnología, Polímeros, Simulación de procesos, Diseño de procesos, Liderazgo, Microsoft Word

profile_positions.description: I lead the renovation of the Company. It has been necessary to refresh the processes, the distribution, the product and the brand, thus achieving a new audience. My work group and I reduced the product's storage time by more than 60% and nonconformities by 80%. The changes implemented has been a fundamental tool to afront the new market challenges.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• I led the creation of a Community of a heterogeneous population of about 50 residents, through the design and implementation of experiences that allow expanding their social, educational, community and personal development.
• I was the familiar first resource for the students from different regions with ages ranging from 17 to 27 years. I helped them with their academic or institutional questions and I refer them to counseling resources or accompaniment
• Together with my team, I managed to increase the participation of residents in community activities by 25%.
profile_positions.title: Resident Mentor

profile_positions.description: I accompanied the process of acquiring technical and communication skills in disciplinary content to 25 students, of sixth and seventh semester, through practical laboratories, projects and oral and written defence.
profile_positions.title: Assistant teacher of Unitary Operations Laboratory - Chemical Engineering Department

profile_positions.description:
• I contributed to obtain the accreditation of the ISO/IEC 17025:2005 standard of 20 laboratory tests from the Department of Innovation and Development.
• I supported the implementation of the “Root Cause” methodology for the generation of action plans for the management of non-conformities in innovation and development laboratories.
• I assisted in the reaction and correction in more than 10 formats, instructive and protocols.
profile_positions.title: ISO practitioner

education.degree_name: Master of Science in Mechanical Engineer

company.name: Mabe Global
company.description:
Mabe, empresa mexicana líder en línea blanca en América, cuenta con más de 70 años de historia que respaldan el constante éxito, innovación y calidad. Nuestro rápido crecimiento nos ha permitido convertirnos en el líder exportador de línea blanca alrededor del mundo desde 1960.

Actualmente contamos con 9 plantas de producción, 16 marcas, 11 oficinas comerciales y un Centro de Tecnología y Proyectos que genera investigación y desarrollo a nivel mundial.

Además de ser reconocidos por la alta calidad de nuestros productos y por el continuo crecimiento de la empresa, nos enorgullece vivir bajo una sólida filosofía interna que orienta las acciones y comportamiento de nuestros colaboradores para juntos seguir creciendo.
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


Mabe, a lead world appliance company has over more than 70 years of successful history, innovation and quality, being an export industry since 1960.
Today we count with 9 production plants, 16 distinct brands, 11 commercial offices and a technology and projects center that generates research and development worldwide.

In addition to being well known for our high quality products and continuous improvement, we are proud to live according a strong philosophy that guides our decisions and behavior in order to keep increasing continuously.
